article: Henry was a carpenter of our village . Once I asked him to make a table for my family . A week later , Henry sent us the table and the bill as well . My wife said to me , " It ' s a beautiful table , dear , is n ' t it ? " " I wo n ' t decide about that until I see the bill . " I said . Henry was drinking a glass of water . He laughed and gave me a piece of paper . It said , Bill One dining table June 10 , 2011 Cost of wood 17 . 00 Paint 1 . 50 Work , 8 hours ( 1 an hour ) 8 . 00 Total 36 . 50 When I was looking at the bill , Henry said , " It ' s a fine day , is n ' t it ? Quite sunny . " " Yes , " I said . " I ' m glad it is only the 10th of June . " " Me too , " said Henry . " You wait . It will be a bit hotter by the end of the month . " " Yes , hotter and more expensive . The table will be 20 more expensive on June 30th , wo n ' t they , Henry ? " I said , " If it is n ' t too much trouble , please add it up again . You can forget the date . " " OK , man . You are such a guy . " Henry said with a smile in his two blue eyes , and he left with the money he should get .
questions: The bill showed 36 . 50 in all because Henry

model: added the date to the bill
sent the bill to the writer
human: did n ' t do well in math
added the date to the bill
